name: automation-testing-website
description: A comprehensive platform for testing automation frameworks

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
